summary:
Complete documentation of the BuyAPixel codebase including:
- Overview of tech stack (React 18, TypeScript, Vite, Supabase)
- All root configuration files (package.json, vite.config.ts, tailwind.config.ts)
- Entry points and main App component architecture
- Type definitions for grid, profile, and marketplace
- 9 custom hooks with functionality details
- 7 utility modules including SpatialIndex for performance
- 21 pages with features and responsibilities
- 30+ components plus 41 UI components from shadcn
- Supabase backend with 7 Edge Functions and 21 migrations
- Architecture diagram and data flow documentation
- Performance optimization strategies
